name: tree_topological_order_counting
chinese_name: 浅谈树拓扑序计数相关问题的一些方法
author: 陈昕阳
complexity: O(n^{2/3}) or O(√n poly log n) depending on the method used
summary: This paper discusses methods for counting tree topological orders, which involve combinatorial problems related to enumerating valid orderings of nodes in a tree under specific constraints. The focus is on leveraging algebraic and number-theoretic techniques, including Dirichlet convolutions, generating functions, and advanced data structures, to efficiently compute these counts.
